targets.rawSql: SELECT Body, Timestamp, TraceId, SpanId, TraceFlags, SeverityText, SeverityNumber, ServiceName, ResourceAttributes, LogAttributes FROM "logs" WHERE   ( Timestamp  >= $__fromTime AND Timestamp <= $__toTime ) AND ServiceName In (${serviceName:singlequote}) AND ( Body LIKE '%"Request"%' ) LIMIT 100

targets.rawSql: SELECT Body, TraceId, Timestamp FROM "logs" WHERE   ( Timestamp  >= $__fromTime AND Timestamp <= $__toTime ) AND ( Body LIKE '%{"Request":%' ) ORDER BY Timestamp DESC LIMIT 100

SELECT Body, Timestamp, TraceId, SpanId, TraceFlags, SeverityText, SeverityNumber, ServiceName, ResourceAttributes, LogAttributes FROM "logs" WHERE   ( Timestamp  >= $__fromTime AND Timestamp <= $__toTime ) AND ServiceName In (${serviceName:singlequote}) AND (NOT ( Body LIKE '%Request%' )) LIMIT 100
